title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 376.1 - Traversing the Niagara River Gorge on a high wire
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 376.1 - Traversing the Niagara River Gorge on a high wire

State Regulations

The office shall authorize Nik Wallenda to access Niagara

Falls State Park for the purpose of traversing over the Niagara River Gorge to
or from Canada on a high wire on one occasion as required by the provisions of
chapter 572 of the Laws of 2011 and pursuant to any additional terms and
conditions the office deems necessary and appropriate to protect public health, safety and welfare and to recoup costs for the event. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
376.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
